_sText: ------------------------ Surf_buck-fever2 Created by Buck Nasty ------------------------ THIS IS A REVISION OF BUCK-FEVER I was really unsatisfied with the way the first version came out, so here's the second. There are way too many changes to list, so I suggest you play the map for yourself. So, like the first version... - Bounce off the bullseye bounce pads to launch yourself across the map. - The bounce pads have 2 pushes on them: 1. Center - more powerful 2. Outer - less powerful - There is a 4 way directional chevron arrow above each pad to launch you in that specific direction. - There are also chevrons on the walkable water areas that push you towards the bounce pads to launch you back on to the surf. - If you fall you are spawned in the middle of the map and you have to walk to the bounce pads (the chevron paths are accessible to go faster). - Each team is color coded: Terrorists : RED Counter-Terrorists : BLUE Special thanks to... - Spoz (incline supports) - Ryan Sterner (motivation) - All those who attended the beta tests on my surf server ...sorry if I forgot anyone. I'd rather not ask for constructive criticism cause I honestly don't care, this map is the way I like it. Although, compliments are always welcome. Enjoy! --Buck Nasty http://solidsurf.info/ http://steamcommunity.com/groups/bucknastysurf Map is in rotation @ my Surf Shack IP: css.nyfiber.net:30000
